text: Displaying the file size in the overveiw will help admins find files that are too large. Way too many of my users are uploading 3 MB image files that are too large to be of practical use. As it is now, admins don't have an easy option for detecting these files without going to each and every resource to see it's size. Since I use file system quotas, this is an even larger issue.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org

text: First run at providing this functionality is in 634853. Size is in KB. Unfortunately that doesn't sort using the currently available sort in overview. This will be something I'll try to look at next week.
